website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Suede Classic has been on the market since the 60s and the iconic model is still well and alive to this day. Puma kicked its classic silhouette up a notch with a mid-top height for a sportier look and threw in a definite hint of street swagger.While a few suffered from the Puma Suede Classic Mid’s width issue, this shoe is still commendable for its unmatched comfort, premium detailing, durability, and affordability.
pros: The Puma Suede Classic Mid is available at an affordable price point
This shoe has been commended for its comfortable fit
Many buyers praised the fashionable look of the Suede Classic Mid
Some even shared that they received compliments from friends
A couple of users liked the sufficient ankle support of this sneaker
Few buyers praised the high-quality materials used
Many buyers revealed that they would recommend this shoe to their friends
This shoe has good ground traction for several reviewers
Several purchasers have commended the lightness of this kick
This sneaker runs true to size
Many buyers liked the notable colorways available on the market
cons: One user complained that the appearance of the shoe is different in actual compared to its online photos
Few users griped about the tad narrow width of the Puma Suede Classic Mid

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my boyfriend. They look good on him and he says they are so comfortable. Fits as expected. I bought these in September that is why they look worn.
customer_reviews.author: Mh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 41 and 1/2 in European. I Bought the 42 size (9 US) Red one and it suits me just fine. Really nice shoe. Feels good and look good too! 5 stars :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need return info to see if i can get them in size 9!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the red swade but there a bit big wish I would of bought a size 9 and not 9.5, I'd like to return them and get the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small at top and sides, runs more narrow than I knew or was warned about
customer_reviews.text: While it fits generally, I would have liked a warning that these run narrow. My smallest toes feel squeezed from the top/sides even though the size itself is a good fit. I am very disappointed as I was looking forward to these being the most comfortable shoes however they are less than that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Delson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son and he said they work great...
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Navarrette

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly stylist n Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teenager he loves them doesn't take them off states they are very comfortable and he's received several compliments in school even from the staff!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sashica Caraballo

customer_reviews.title: Big fan
customer_reviews.text: Love these and hope they restock them in blue. Comfortable and great looking with shorts or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker77

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that i needed to put some cushy insoles in (I expected this) I love them and am thinking about getting another pair in black!
customer_reviews.author: Kevsac916

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: These are just bad ass so sharp I almost cut myself
customer_reviews.author: Happy 308 boy

customer_reviews.title: I had no concern or criticism for this item.
customer_reviews.text: Pumas are always classic and comfortable. They arrived quickly and were sent straight from the manufacturer. No one had tried them on and returned them!! ( I hate getting shoes or sneaks that I believe someone has tried on)
customer_reviews.author: G Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and perfect color! This RED is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: The Great Oz

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The box came F-up but the shoes look amazing, nice suede, the color is really good and they feel great. If they had a light gray i would buy those too but for now red it is.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend Loved these shoes!! They were a Christmas gift. They fit perfectly and look even better in person
customer_reviews.author: Keleigh Anne

customer_reviews.title: good for
customer_reviews.text: i bought 9.5 a little small if size correct, good for everything
customer_reviews.author: DJ Park

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: That's what good about Amazon Great pair of legit kicks
customer_reviews.author: JERRY ROMO

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sneaker. I get compliments on them every time ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sneaker. I get compliments on them every time I wear them. It was a steal to get them for $35!! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: iHOOLIGGAN

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for my friend and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Dval69

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my size arrived incorrect I was expecting an 8 and arrived a 10 :/
customer_reviews.author: Allan Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: it is a little bit small than I always wear ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a little bit small than I always wear 9.5 nike ,it make me confused

customer_reviews.text: What is there to say there Pumas and they make great shoes.

customer_reviews.title: There very nice shoes pretty sure the new size will be good
customer_reviews.text: They where too small but i sent them back for a bigger size. Cusrtomer service is always helpful.thank you. There very nice shoes pretty sure the new size will be good.
customer_reviews.author: glenda thompson

customer_reviews.title: The availability of the items
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort of the shoe most. I liked least that I couldn’t get the pumas with the white puma sign.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Worldwide Fly
customer_reviews.text: From the Hindu Kush to Independence Square, these will turn heads in at least 10 languages. Fit is as expected. Not a lot of arch support, but still comfortable enough to walk all day in. *Individual head turning experiences may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE LOOK
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Puma since 1983. I really like the mid high top look and I am very happy with these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Bee

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband but they fit too loose. He wears size 8 and these fit like 9. They’re made without comfort or any support. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Girl Frietze
